title: The Speed Cubers
description:
Tig and Cheryl solve the riddle of "The Speed Cubers," a surprisingly emotional (not to spill beans!) look at the world of lightning fast Rubik's Cubers. Can a 3x3, color-coded cube be the secret to making Tig and/or Cheryl weep? You'll have to listen to today's episode to find out!

BUY TICKETS TO OUR LIVE SHOW, SEPT 22: https://app.loopedlive.com/b/8536

*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)
